entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET_TC_AggressiveTiering doesn't work as expected #101868
    Future
  • `PublishReadyToRun=true` significantly regresses startup time when used with `EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true` #101866
  • Erroneous linker error when using DAM attributes + primary constructors #101861
    9.0.0
  • Dll Search Path Behavior for Windows System Dlls for certain dotnet apps (WPF?) #101857
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests does not appear to actually run against .NET 8 #101846
  • Regarding Memory Leak Check in Android Platform with dotnet-gcdump #101847
  • (net9.0-ios preview 3) SRE not available when interpreter is enabled #101840
  • ThreadLocals and Finalization/GC #101839
  • Environment.ProcessPath / Environment.GetCommandLineArgs()[0] discrepancies #101837
  • [8.0] Test failure: Unknown chain building error in System.Net.Security.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #101835
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][osx] Test failure: ILLink.Tasks.Tests.TaskArgumentTests.TestRootDescriptorFiles #101833
  • [8.0][mono][interpreter] Native crash in System.Linq.Queryable.Tests #101831
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][ios][arm64][mono] Build error: SecKeychainUnlock signing-certs.keychain-db: user name or passphrase incorrect #101830
  • `ObjectFactory<T>` delegate should be covariant #101829

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #94479
    9.0.0
  • Enable multi-register intrinsics support for Arm64 #64921
    9.0.0
  • Stress issues on x86 in JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/V8/Crypto/Crypto/Crypto.dll #100695
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: reflection/DefaultInterfaceMethods/Emit/Emit.cmd #98973
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/delegate/regressions/devdivbugs/113347/DDB113347/DDB113347.cmd #98972
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #92574
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/synchronized/synchronized.cmd #96600
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Double #91746
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #92942
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections #95349
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 12/8/2023 12:07:17 AM #96498
    9.0.0
  • PublishReadyToRun=True regresses startup time when EnableCompressionInSingleFile=True #101862
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.LogicArray #96195
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regressions on 2/14/2024 8:50:48 AM #98706
    9.0.0
  • The StringBuilder.Append(Char[], Int32, Int32) method call throws the System.ArgumentOutOfRange exception in a valid situation when the app targets .NET 8 and built in the Release configuration #96839
    9.0.0
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler and NSUrlSessionHandler in the same net8.0-ios project causes incorrect 401 runtime errors for NTLM authorized HTTP requests #99892
  • Consider creating a ranged version of CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_BYREF #8627
    9.0.0
  • JIT should use boxing helper to box structs with many GC pointers #101699
    9.0.0
  • HMACSHA256 randomly throws: System.ArgumentException #100809
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span #95073
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 Regressions on 11/12/2023 8:47:21 PM #94724
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Int16 #89790
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently on Alpine 3.17 #83101
    Future
  • [Hanging test] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingOptionsCallback_Throws #86006
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'parent->OperGet() == oper' during 'LSRA allocate' #99810
    9.0.0
  • Cannot add System.Json to an Android .NET 8 project #101758

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable streaming by default for EventPipe sessions started by environment variable #101867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of Debugger.NotifyOfCrossThreadDependency under a debugger #101864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Min*/Max* APIs #101859
    arm-sve
  • Optimize 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' #101858
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • s390x: Fix nonvolatile context restoration #101854
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BitwiseClear and BooleanNot #101853
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Remove old JIT perf lab experiments; add block layout experiment #101852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Test RPO-based block layout in runtime-jit-experimental #101851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify/optimize Int128 comparison operators #101848
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix typos in TensorPrimitives MultiplyAdd documentation #101845
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add tests for OAVariantLib #101841
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • `explosed` -> `exposed` #101836
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: profile checking through inlining #101834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #101838
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [mono] Add check for generic types as target types #101850
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [PERF] Revert using specific dotnet-version changes. #101860
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Bulk copy of byrefs #101761
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add simple bitwise ops #101762
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Expose DOTNET_JitNoInline in Release #101798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't enable use-after-return checking on Apple's Clang #101781
    area-Infrastructure
  • LSRA: Remove assert that enforces all multi-reg RefPositions to be either copy or reload but not mixed #101824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trim instructionset name in helper #101794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark swift error as busy before call definition RefPosition #101792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #101832
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Pin net7.0 to 7.0.19 #101823
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [wasi][windows] Disable the wasi-aot-library tests on windows #101827
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Enable cross-block local assertion prop for natural loops #101763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running System.Runtime trimming tests #101592
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running S.L.Expressions trimming tests #101593
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport #92901) #101703
    area-Infrastructure
  • Typename parsing cleanup #101767
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure the scalar Reciprocal*Estimate APIs use AVX512 where possible #101800
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] SVE Cleanup: Merging SVE_AE_3A, SVE_AN_3A, SVE_EP_3A, SVE_ER_3A, SVE_ET_3A, SVE_EU_3A into SVE_AA_3A #101785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0 error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64. No packages exist with this id in source(s): nuget.org #40676
  • `dotnet tool install` doesn't respect `isRoot` property in manifest #40655

Closed

  • Add `dotnet tool update --all` option #10130
    8.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add bootstrapper validation to clickonce test #40683
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix doc typo in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.CSharp.targets #40504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Exponentiation operator #2585
    Any Time
  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918
  • Compiler can't determine best common type for `switch` expression #8025

PullRequests

Created

  • Dictionary expressions: update conversion rules based on recent discussions #8095

Updated

  • Add proposal for overload resolution priority #7906
  • Fix proposed type inference rules for spans and arrays and clarify explicit conversions #8094

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73330
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync() does not load anything #73327
  • The editor config should allow specifying whether a warning is included in code cleanup #73321
  • explicit lambda return type behavior with covariant delegates #73319

Closed

  • Debug assertion failure in MethodSymbol.AsMember when called from NullableWalker.GetNullableOfTValueSlot #73182
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Add helper for common pattern of producing an array. #73336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add public API for ref like type parameters #73335
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add additional extension type tests #73334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve analyzer consistency check message #73329
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Move more code over to producer/consumer model #73331
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Port runtime's Parallel.ForEachAsync so we can use it on NetFx. #73332
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add tests for extensions and Find-Refs #73333
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add intellisense support for extension types. #73315
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move more code over to ProducerConsumer model. #73324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add AutomationPeer for inheritance marign glyph #73311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide a ProducerConsumer helper for processing a sequence of items in parallel. #73323
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a producer/consumer queue to search for computing refactorings #73322
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #73318
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Switch to a producer/consumer queue to search for add-using results. #73320
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make tests consistent #73316
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add tasks for running a new vscode instance with a specific language server #69865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #55523
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #55522
  • Blazor Bug in LONG data type #55521
  • Add a Blazor Cache component #55520
  • Blazor.webassembly.js - Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') #55518
  • Multiple @page breaks css isolation in .net 8.0 blazor #55517
  • Checkbox input tag helper throws FormatException: 1 is not a valid value for Boolean #55512
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #55510

Closed

  • IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature.Timestamp is empty #55334
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55509
  • Route Recognition of method with input type #55431
  • `endpoints.MapControllers().WithMetadata(new ApiExplorerSettingsAttribute { GroupName })` doesn't work #54087
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #55492
  • CreatedResult does not set StatusCode #55483
    9.0-preview5
  • Burstable capacity? #55289
  • [QUIC] `QuicConnectionContext.Abort` calls connection shutdown with error code -1 #55196

PullRequests

Created

  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Experimental revert of P/Invoke layer #55519
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `2954cb8` #55514
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add internal pipeline to test IdentityModel nightlies #55504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.6
  • Fix IdentityModel pipeline #55527
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Enable trimming for OpenAPI package #55465
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0] Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55501
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55502
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.31
  • 1es-ify IdentityModel test pipeline #55505
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix generating XML doc comments for query parameters in gRPC JSON transcoding #55482
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview5
  • Set status code on CreatedResult types #55494
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview5
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc
  • removing pure comment #55496
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version to address CVE-2023-29331 #55304
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Supports collecting GCSettingsEvent for gc-collect profile #4615
  • [SymbolStore] Add support to index .NET Framework Runtime debugging modules #4616
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor hybrid template #22205
    9.0-preview5
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_Generic ObjectDisposed_ObjectName_Name, Android.OS.PowerManager #22204
  • ListViewItem doesn't exists any more #22202
  • PointerGestureRecognizer Does not work on android #22199
  • AbsoluteLayout with SizeProportional not working #22195
  • LineHeight with HTML Label not working #22193
  • [Android] CollectionView EmptyView using a View or Template is not rendering #22191
  • [Android] Deleting an item from the CollectionView takes a long time #22190
  • [Android] Crash updating the ItemSpacing at runtime #22187
  • [Android] CollectionView stutters #22185
  • [Android] Performance issue with Horizontal ScrollView #22184
  • RadioButton with value cannot display selected state correctly #22183

Closed

  • Cannot bind Shell Items #22145
    Backlog
  • App crashes with ArgumentOutOfRangeException when FlyoutItemIsVisible changes (WinUI only) #16929
    Backlog
  • Consider implementing the PointerOver state for .NET 6 #12597
    Backlog
  • Maui Blazor - MacOs - Interacting with input date tag crashes the app. #22181
  • [Android] Performance issues with CollectionView using grouping and variable sizes #22192
  • UI sometimes becomes uninteractive with the mouse after selecting a file from a file input (.NET MAUI Blazor) #15072
  • Flyout button is visible for a split second when navigating back to home page in Android #22144
  • [Android] Large loading time of a Page with CollectionView using template selector #22189
  • [Android] CollectionView ScrollTo using the index not working #22188
  • CollectionView Containing SwipeView Within a Grid Throws Access Violation on Windows #9233
  • lineheight is broken #22197
  • Need Help with White Labeling a MAUI App from Existing Project #22182
  • SearchBar not expanding horizontally #10823
    Backlog
  • horizontal scrollable datepicker #22179
  • Pages not appearing in .NET MAUI app #20271
  • Maui ios app crash when using bindings for gradientstops #15919
  • Flyout open close with some lagging #21876
  • MAUI Shell Flyout unwanted click through behavior #21097
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id #21975
  • Not able to change the color of scroller and also scroller is not getting visible on verticalScroll="always* #19622
  • XAML ContentPage.Content required for data to appear. #21790
  • DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme #21858
  • App assumes dark mode after resume on device with UIAlertController presented #21986

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    community ✨
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area/templates 📄
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton

Merged

  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Fixed On Platform="Default" not working #22148
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • For XAML Hot Reload: Add public method to clear ResourceDictionary cache #22157
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area/Xaml </>
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix comparison for scenario tests condition #19670
  • Disable scenario tests #19668

Merged

  • Update artifacts size baseline #19665
  • Create 0001-Make-IDE0073-silent.patch #19664
  • Fixup tag for sdk diff test runs #19662
  • Create 0001-Disable-sdk-Installer-portion.patch #19655

Updated

  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • Restructure test assets and baselines #19650
  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #19585
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Add top-level controls to VMR for system libraries #19640
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #19645
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19615
